resources.string: Application it contains more than 13518 cosmetic products .
Scan products, take them in picture, make cosmetic transparency happen
Extensive information about the product you\'ve scanned, deciphered for you
Keep track of the product you use
All the cosmetic you use, in one handy list you can export
You can add new products, even if you don\'t have an Internet connection right now
The product you scanned does not exist yet in Application of cosmetic products. Please add it.
Look at this product on Application of cosmetic products :
- broadening your search \n- scan and add it to Application of cosmetic products
Click here to donate to Application of cosmetic products
Help translate Application of cosmetic products
Bring the Application of cosmetic products database to your language - no technical knowledge required

Scan the products even when you are offline so as to add them to Application of cosmetic products later. The scanned products will appear here and you will be able to send them using the button below.

Your allergies info will never be sent to the Application of cosmetic products server. Also, be careful that product data may not be accurate, and detection might not be 100% accurate, so please double-check by yourself!
